description.value: Chthonic Lep'ix have an affinity for the realms of gloom and turmoil. Their mystical gifts portend ruin and obscuration. Wing patterns may include features such as uncanny visages, chaotic intersecting geometry, or sinister eyes, to name a few.

system.classDetails:
Chthonic Lep'ix Traits

  • Compatibility: Insectoid
  • Attribute Increase: Your Dexterity and Presence both increase by 1.
  • Chthonic Magic: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.T8FJEIROS5Z5B8TH]{Chthonic Magic}
  • Baleful Resistance: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.U2LZOAWTN9HEYR6F]{Baleful Resistance}
  • Darkvision 60ft: @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.1F3VSNLQTVMYA4PE]{Darkvision 60ft}
  • Ominous Sight: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.G0FGCDYBZHCRKAO7]{Ominous Sight}
  • Cryptic Essence: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.LH7JHOI6Q9N5ES88]{Cryptic Essence}
  • Language: You can speak, read, and write Infernal.
